global.device-connect-new: Please tap the Solos Airgo icon to connect new device

global.no-device-connected: No Solos AirGo smart glasses is conncted
global.device-disconnected: Solos AirGo smart glasses has been disconnected.
global.app-not-installed-install-now: {{value}} app is not installed. Do you want to install it now?
global.cant-start-wait-content: please wait until the voice prompt finishes
global.setting-reset: Do you want to reset the settings now?
global.cant-start-airgo-not-connected: Cannnot start {{value}} because Solos AirGo smart glasses is not connected.  Do you want to connect AirGo smart glasses now?
global.cant-start-airgo-not-wear: Cannot start {{value}} because Solos AirGo smart glasses is not put on
global.cant-start-not-calibrate: Cannot start {{value}} because your reference posture has not been calibrated.</br> Do you want to calibrate now?
global.multipoint-on-device-reset-msg: Solos AirGo smart glasses is going to power off automatically in order that the change will take effect. Please power on it to connect to maximum of 2 phones simultaneously
global.multipoint-off-device-reset-msg: Solos AirGo smart glasses is going to power off automatically in order that the change will take effect. Please power on it to connect 1 phone only

setup.title: Setup
setup.welcome-content: This instruction will guide you through the simple steps to set up Solos AirGo smart glasses.
setup.power-on-content: Power on the Solos AirGo smart glasses by pressing Multi Function Button for 5 seconds until its LED is flashing in blue/red color and “Pairing” voice prompt is heard.
setup.ios-pair-content:
1. Open system's Bluetooth Settings
2. Turn on Bluetooth 
3. Wait for “Solos Air XXXX” name to appear, where XXXX is an device ID 
4. Tap on “Solos Air XXXX” name to pair with Solos AirGo smart glasses.
setup.android-pair-content:
1. Turn on Bluetooth
2. Wait for “Solos Air XXXX” name to appear above, where XXXX is an device ID 
3. Tap on “Solos Air XXXX” name to pair with Solos AirGo smart glasses
setup.congratulation-content: The Solos AirGo smart glasses is ready to use.
setup.really-skip-content: Are you really want to skip the Setup instruction?
setup.ios-connect-device-error: Cannot find Solos AirGo smart glasses. Please ensure Solos AirGo smart glasses is successfully paired to this phone and it is currently switched on
setup.android-connect-device-error: Cannot connect Solos AirGo smart glasses. Please ensure your Solos AirGO smart glasses is already in pairing mode.

tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.really-skip-content: Are you really want to skip the Tutorial?

solos-air.app-not-installed-install-now: {{value}} app is not installed. Do you want to install it now?

ai-coach-util.cant-start-exercise-bc-training-running: Cannot start Basic Training because another training is running.

posture-training.title: Posture Training
posture-training.intro: Posture training helps you to maintain in proper posture to keep your head straight during running.

cadence-training.title: Cadence Training
cadence-training.intro: Cadence training helps you achieve target cadence during running, thus speeding up the running pace and reducing the chance of injury.
cadence-training.should-equal-greater-30: The value must be equal or grater than 30
cadence-training.should-equal-less-220: The value must be equal or less than 220

interval-training.title: Interval Training
interval-training.intro: Interval training helps to improve your aerobic capacity, which benefits heart health as well as weight loss.

step-count.title: Step Count
step-count.intro: Step Count helps you to set your daily goal of steps and it counts the number of steps you take each day, converting recorded into periodic data. Persistently walk helps lower heart disease and other health problems.
step-count.should-above-1000: The value must be larger than 1000 steps

ai-coach.heart-rate-is: Heart Rate is {{value}} beats per minute
ai-coach.pacing-is-full-km: Current pacing is {{min}} minutes and {{sec}} seconds per kilometer
ai-coach.pacing-is-full-mile: Current pacing is {{min}} minutes and {{sec}} seconds per mile
ai-coach.avg-pacing-is-full-km: Average pacing is {{min}} minutes and {{sec}} seconds per kilometer
ai-coach.avg-pacing-is-full-mile: Average pacing is {{min}} minutes and {{sec}} seconds per mile
ai-coach.cadence-is-full: Current cadence is {{value}} steps per minute
ai-coach.avg-cadence-is-full: Average cadence is {{value}} steps per minute
ai-coach.stopped-airgo-not-connected: Activity is stopped because Solos AirGo smart glasses has been disconnected.
ai-coach.cant-start-airgo-not-connected: Activity cannot be started because Solos AirGo smart glasses is not connected. Do you want to connect AirGo smart glasses now?
ai-coach.cant-start-airgo-not-wear: Activity cannot be started because Solos AirGo smart glasses is not put on
ai-coach.cant-start-posture-monitoring-running: Activity cannot be started because posture monitor is running.

exercise.intro: Posture exercise provides a couple of head posture exercises with levels to help reduce neck pain and improve forward head posture.
exercise.stopped-airgo-not-connected: Exercise is stopped because Solos AirGo has been disconnected.
exercise.voice-prompt-head-up: Please move your head up {{value}} degrees
exercise.voice-prompt-head-down: Please move your head down {{value}} degrees
exercise.voice-prompt-head-left: Please turn your head left {{value}} degrees
exercise.voice-prompt-head-right: Please turn your head right {{value}} degrees
exercise.voice-prompt-tilt-left: Please tilt your head left {{value}} degrees
exercise.voice-prompt-tilt-right: Please tilt your head right {{value}} degrees
exercise.voice-prompt-keep-postion: Please keep your head at this position for few seconds

warm-up.title: Posture Warm Up
warm-up.instructions: Please move & rotate your head around to do warm up before posture exercise.

monitoring.intro: Posture monitor helps to oversee your sitting or standing posture by alerting you whenever you're slouching or leaning forward too much.
monitoring.stopped-airgo-not-connected: Monitor is stopped because Solos AirGo smart glasses has been disconnected.

calibration.title: Posture Calibration
calibration.first-round-start: Please relax, sit up or stand straight and don't move
calibration.second-round-start: Please relax, sit up or stand straight and don't move
calibration.calibration-not-match: Two calibrations do not match, the calibration will be started over again
calibration.not-calibrate-content: Your reference posture has not been calibrated.</br> Do you want to calibrate now?
calibration.stop-airgo-not-connected: Calibration is stopped because Solos AirGo smart glasses has been disconnected.

water-reminder.title: Drink Water Reminder
water-reminder.intro: Drink Water Reminder allows you to set recurrent reminders for keeping you the intake of enough water daily.

profile.login-intro: Login to unblock features to track your movement and exercise history
profile.login-create-account-available-soon: Login and Create Account features will be available soon

create-acc.name: Name
create-acc.sign-up-instruction: Please fill the details and create account

profile-setting.name: Name
profile-setting.should-equal-greater-90: The value must be equal or greater than 90

device-info.cant-cal-compass-ai-coach-running: Compass cannot be calibrated because AI coach activity is running.
device-info.cant-cal-compass-monitoring-running: Compass cannot be calibrated because posture monitor is running.

compass-cal.guideline: Please hold your Solos AirGo smart glasses, block the proximity sensor, which is located below the LED, and swing it in above shape to calibrate its compass.
compass-cal.disconnect-message: Calibration is stopped because the Solos AirGo smart glasses has been disconnected.

music-player.spotify-not-installed: Cannot play Spotify music because Spotify app is not installed. Do you want to install it now?
music-player.apple-authorization-denied: Cannot play iTunes music because you do not have the permission to access the requested resource. Please go to the Solo AirGo app settings to allow using Media & Apple Music. Do you want to open app settings now?
music-player.apple-authorization-restricted: Cannot play iTunes music because you are restricted from accessing the Music & Apple Music.

firmware.battery-below-50: Cannot update firmware because Solos AirGo smart glasses battery is below 50%
firmware.coach-running: Cannot update firmware because AI coach activity is running
firmware.posture-monitoring: Cannot update firmware because posture monitor is running
firmware.new-firmware-available: New firmware version is available. Do you want to install it now?
firmware.install-new-firmware: Installing new firmware, please do not power off the Solos AirGo smart glasses ...
firmware.restart-new-firmware: Restarting Solos AirGo smart glasses, please wait ...
firmware.abort-upgrade-firmware: Are you sure to abort the firmware upgrade?
firmware.abort-upgrade-timeout: The firmware upgrade is aborted because of timeout. Please power on Solos AirGo smart glass again.
firmware.install-firmware-timeout: Cannot reconnect the Solos AirGo smart glasses. Please try to connect the Solos AirGo smart glasses manually.
firmware.firmware-up-to-date: Solos AirGo smart glasses firmware is up-to-date
firmware.firmware-updated: Solos AirGo smart glasses firmware has been successfully updated
firmware.download-disconnected: The firmware upgrade is aborted because Solos AirGo smart glasses is disconnected. Please connect Solos AirGo smart glasses and retry again.
firmware.unplug-charger: Please unplug the charging cable from Solos AirGo smart glasses for installation.

forgot-password.reset-password-instruction: Please enter your registered email address below for us to send you an email to reset your password.
forgot-password.password-reset-sent-msg:
We've emailed you the instruction to reset your passwod. You should receive it shortly.

If you don't receive the email, please make sure you've entered the correct email address you registered with, and check your spam folder.

parse.Account already exists for this username: Account already exists for this email address.
parse.Your password has expired. Please reset: Your password has expired. Please reset your password.

training.average-cadence: Average cadence is {{x}} steps per minute
training.cant-start-training-error: Something went wrong. Activity could not be started successfully
training.should-below-60: The value must be less than 60 mins

heart-rate-info.wearfit-disconnect-bt: To disconnect heart rate device {{x}} completely, please disconnect it from phone's Bluetooth settings. Otherwise, it can't be discovered again.

stretch.title: Stretch Exercise
stretch.intro: Posture exercise provides a couple of body stretching exercises with levels to help reduce muscle tension and improve your coordination and balance.
stretch.left-obliques: Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, raise the right arm and include your torso to left
stretch.right-obliques: Stand with your feet shoulder width apart, raise the left arm and include your torso to right
stretch.left-twist: Stand upright and slowly twist to the left from your waist without moving your hips
stretch.right-twist: Stand upright and slowly twist to the right from your waist without moving your hips
stretch.voice-prompt-obliques-left: Please bend your torso slowly to left
stretch.voice-prompt-obliques-right: Please bend your torso slowly to right
stretch.voice-prompt-twist-left: Please twist slowly to the left
stretch.voice-prompt-twist-right: Please twist slowly to the right

squats.title: SQUATS
squats.intro: Stand with your feet shoulder width, push your hips backward and sit toward your heels, keeping your core tight, back straight and upper body upright

strava.connect-strava-statement:
Connect with Strava?

By connecting with Strava, you agree to share information from Solos AirGo account to Strava. This may includes AI coach activities, location, heart rate and related metrics or other personal data.

You can opt out at any time in Solos AirGo settings.
strava.disconnect-strava-statement:
Disconnect from Strava?

Solos AirGo is currently sharing your information with Strava. This may includes AI coach activities, location, heart rate and related metrics or other personal data.

Disconnecting from Strava will revoke your consent to share. Data previously shared with Strava will not be affected.
strava.access-denied-error: Cannot connect to Strava because of access denied error
strava.auth-error: Cannot connect to Strava because of authorization error
strava.unknown-error: Cannot connect to Strava because of {{value}}
strava.unauthorized-scope-error: Cannot connect to Strava because the permission to upload your activities from Solos AirGo to Strava is denied
strava.invalid-get-token-response: Cannot connect to Strava because error is found when getting the tokens
strava.invalid-refresh-token-response: Cannot connect to Strava because error is found when refreshing the tokens

tts.lang-not-supported: Voice prompt is disabled because 'Google Text-to-Speech' is not enabled. Please open 'Play Store' to enable and update the 'Google Text-to-Speech', and then restart AirGo mobile app

bluetooth.unauthorized: Cannot connect Solos AirGo smart glasses because this app is not allowed to use Bluetooth. Please go to the Solo AirGo app settings to allow using Bluetooth. Do you want to open app settings now?
bluetooth.off: Cannot connect Solos AirGo smart glasses because Bluetooth is turned OFF, Please go to the Bluetooth settings to turn on the Bluetooth. Do you want to open Bluetooth Settings now?
bluetooth.location: Cannot connect Solos AirGo smart glasses because location permission is not granted for Bluetooth connection. Please go to the App settings to authorize location permission. Do you want to open the settings now?

fat-burn.title: Fat Burn
fat-burn.intro: Fast walk assists you to carry out fat burn exercise by simply following the beep sound and voice instructions
fat-burn.say-warm-up: Warm up! Walk at the same pace of the beep sound
fat-burn.say-avg-spm-fast-walk: Average fast walk is {{value}} steps per minute

coupon.show-QR-to-staff: Please show this QR code to the staff
coupon.coupon-redeemed: This coupon was redeemed, thank you!

core-training.title: Core Training
core-training.intro: Core training helps you to create a solid base for staying upright and standing strong.
core-training.alert-no-exercise: At least one set of exercise is needed
core-training.confirm-remove-exercise: Are you confirm to remove the exercise?
core-training.alert-plank-set-count: Plank is not allowed to set with number of count
core-training.confirm-to-cancel-plan: A Core training plan is currently running. The progress will be lost if you choose to cancel it. Are you really want to cancel it now?
core-training.plan-select-weekday: Please select which days of week you are going to do core training
core-training.today-schedule-reminder: You have scheduled core training today
core-training.motion-data-collection-detail: We would like to collect your motion data (accelerometers, gyroscropes & magnetometers) measured by Solos Smart Glasses during core training exercises for examining purpose and accuracy improvement of posture & reps detection. After opt-in, you can opt-out at any time through the Settings menu. Do you agree to allow us to collect your motion data?

equalizer.title: Equalizer
equalizer.set-eq-error: Cannot customize the EQ settings because no music is playing. Please play the music and then customize the EQ
equalizer.device-disconnected-msg: Cannot customize the EQ settings because Solos AirGo smart glasses has been disconnected
